title: Fireside With The Underboss - "I Got Him Made, Later I Had To Take Him Out"
description: In this story Sammy introduces his good friend Louie Milito who is dying to be a made man. He tells us the story about how he got Louie made, but we learn later on that Sammy also has him taken out
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: In this story Sammy introduces his good friend Louie Milito who is dying to be a made man. He tells us the story about how he got Louie made, but we learn later on that Sammy also has him taken out
